snippet: Senior Pentagon officials are stepping up warnings that military intervention in Syria would be a daunting operation with the potential for killing thousands of civilians.
abstract: Pentagon officials step up their warnings that military intervention in Syria will be a daunting and protracted operation, requiring weeks of exclusively American airstrikes, with potential for killing vast numbers of civilians and plunging the country closer to civil war.
lead_paragraph: Senior Pentagon officials are stepping up warnings that military intervention in Syria would be a daunting operation with the potential for killing thousands of civilians.

headline.seo: U.S. Syria Intervention Would Be Risky, Pentagon Officials Say
headline.main: Military Points to Risks of a Syrian Intervention
headline.print_headline: Military Points to Risks Of a Syrian Intervention
